lyrics:
13 contributorsbridge over troubled water lyricsverse 1 johnny cash
when youre weary feeling small
when tears are in your eyes i will dry them all
im on your side oh when times get rough
and friends just cant be found

chorus johnny cash
like a bridge over troubled water
i will lay me down
like a bridge over troubled water
i will lay me down

verse 2 johnny cash
when youre down and out
when youre on the street
when evening falls so hard
i will comfort you

verse 3 johnny cash  fiona apple
ill take your part
when darkness comes
and pain is all around

chorus johnny cash  fiona apple
like a bridge over troubled water
i will lay me down
like a bridge over troubled water
i will lay me down
verse 4 johnny cash
sail on silver girl
sail on by
your time has come to shine
all your dreams are on their way

verse 5 johnny cash  fiona apple
see how they shine
oh if you need a friend
im sailing right behind

chorus johnny cash  fiona apple
like a bridge over troubled water
i will ease your mind
like a bridge over troubled water
i will ease your mindyou might also like1embed
